saas.name: Twitter Search
saas.heading: Instant Twitter Search
saas.subheading: Instantly search across your entire Twitter history. Beautiful UX powered by Algolia.

features.name: Simple setup
features.desc: Easy & **free** to get started. The free tier searches across your 100 most recent tweets.

features.name: Blazing fast
features.desc: Instant search results including custom filters powered by Algolia.

features.name: Beautiful UX
features.desc: Our search UI is simple, responsive, and most importantly **fast**.

features.name: Simple pricing
features.desc: It's easy to test out, and once you're ready to upgrade, we'll sync your full Twitter history.

features.name: Automatic syncing
features.desc: Upgrade to enable automatic syncing of your Twitter account.

features.name: Reliable
features.desc: Built on top of Algolia and serverless functions for maximum availability and scale.

features.name: World class
features.desc: The world's best personal Twitter search.
